description: 2015: a year of fake outrage and the backlash that made us feel better - Vox
The IRL Fetish – The New Inquiry
extended: The deep infiltration of digital information into our lives has created a fervor around the supposed corresponding loss of logged-off real life.

description: What Journalists Can Learn From Police Seizing a BBC Reporter's Laptop | Motherboard
extended: On Wednesday, it was revealed that UK police used powers under the controversial Terrorism Act to seize the laptop of a BBC journalist.
